title: Ben Greene
deck: I’m Ben and I’ve been at Gateway since 2006 after marrying Katie and coming to York to study at York University. Together we are kept busy looking after our 3 boys: Jacob, Zach and Caleb. In my spare time I work as a primary school teacher in the Early Years and love working with families and children at Gateway Church. I also enjoy getting out into the garden, walking, reading and drinking the occasional single malt whisky.
